bibl.title: Native Reactions to Foreign Rule and Culture in Religious Literature.
bibl.note: By going back to pre-Hellenistic Egyptian religious texts and comparing them with Hellenistic ones, presents observations on changes related to the situation in Ptolemaic Egypt within 2 literary genres: the conte prophétique and the magical literature.
bibl.seg: PODEMANN SØRENSEN Jørgen, Native Reactions to Foreign Rule and Culture in Religious Literature.
Per BILDE et alii (Edd.), Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III (Aarhus, 1992) pp. 164-181.

By going back to pre-Hellenistic Egyptian religious texts and comparing them with Hellenistic ones, presents observations on changes related to the situation in Ptolemaic Egypt within 2 literary genres: the conte prophétique and the magical literature.
